item.title: Shaking the Kinder egg - or: metadata of Data Products?
item.description: Shaking the Kinder egg - or: metadata of Data Products Who hasn’t done it? shaking the Kinder eggs to “guess” what’s inside and raise the chance of getting one of the figures. We even put them on the vegetable scale to increase the chance (many many years back the figures had higher weight than the assemble stuff). But in the end, it was all guessing. When we deal with data, we don’t want to guess.
